title: The Rec Room
description: Welcome to the Software Library. Play thousands of classic MS-DOS games, console titles, and explore historical software directly in your browser. No installation required.
endOfArcade: You've reached the end of the arcade.

aiInsight.title: Retro Gamer's Corner
aiInsight.description: Let our AI journalist write a nostalgic editor's note, finding a fun connection between classic games in the arcade.
